Train Wreck: Not mine.

The 2 feather missiles stuck in and exploded, leavi=
ng holes and dents in Train Wreck's armor.

Train Wreck: I don't like this =
at all. What a way for one to get angry.

Train Wreck changed to train mode=
.

Train Wreck: I'm going to run your ass over.

He whispered that aloud an=
d stared through the train eyes insidiously at Windlord. Since his revival,=
 he often got angry to such a high degree, he would harm himself. He starts=
 to overheat as he revs the engine up way too far. he goes speeding towards=
 Windlord, firing his cannon 4 times at the hawk while he sped along. His t=
ires screeched and wailed, and sparks flew from them as they started to mel=
t...

 Wreck

aughed.

ced so easily, especially by rapid fire shots.

    Train Wreck raised the =
cannon. A huge, ugly monstrosity, and fired one very large blast at Windlor=
d...
